institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 5 (Review Committee work)
contents: Article 5 (Deliberation Committee Affairs) â‘  Pursuant to Article 38 of the Operation Regulations, the Chairman of the Board shall deliberate and decide on the following matters by the industry-specific Human Resources Development Deliberation Committee (hereinafter referred to as the *Deliberation Committee)., 1. Association/Group , Matters pertaining to selection and cancellation of joint training center, 2. Matters pertaining to approval of the business plan of the business group and approval of changes to the business plan. However, in the case of a change in the business plan without an increase in the support fund, it may not go through deliberation and resolution by the Deliberation Committee. 3. Matters related to the decision on the support fund for the business group, 4. Matters related to the suspension of support and extension of the support period, etc. to the business group, 5. Matters pertaining to the evaluation of the business performance of the project group and restrictions on participation in industry-led training projects, 6. Matters pertaining to the recovery of support funds pursuant to subparagraphs 4 and 5, 7. Other matters deemed necessary by the chairman for the performance of the project. Matters to be submitted to the deliberation committee
